355300.name: Night Mysteries: The Amphora Prisoner - Official Soundtrack
355300.description:
Original soundtrack of Night Mysteries: The Amphora Prisoner.
Composed by: Dmitry Trots

Track List


  • Intro 02:22
  • Expectation in my heart 03:39
  • Find right way 03:14
  • Amphora Prisoner - Main Theme 02:22
  • A little drama 03:05
  • Old diary 01:23
  • Somewhere near despair 03:12
  • Final theme 00:33

All songs will be downloaded to the Night Mysteries: The Amphora Prisoner\Soundtrack folder in your Steam Directory.
